bs-categorycheck-insertcategory-no-categ: Error message in save dialog when no category was assigned to the current page
bs-categorycheck-insertcategory-ignore-n:
Short label for checkbox that - when checked - ignores any problem with the assigned categories in the save dialog
{{Identical|Ignore}}
bs-categorycheck-insertcategory-category: Short header for the list of categories, that are assigned for the current page
bs-categorycheck-insertcategory-confirm-: Short info text, that indicates, that there is no problem with the assigned categories for the current page.
bs-categorycheck-nsm-label-categorycheck: Label for checkbox option to activate the category check functionality for a specific namespace.
